## TileKey.mortonCode() method

Converts the tile key to a numeric code representation.

You can create a tile key from a numeric Morton code with \[\[fromMortonCode\]\].

Note - only levels less than or equal to 26 are supported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mortonCode(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number
